name: Flight Club (Digital Apathy)
description:
Flight Club - Game made for LD38 "Small World" - Jam.

  • Code: dj_pale
  • Gfx: plink
  • Music: skurk

Source https://github.com/DjPale/DAP-LD38/

Gameplay

Control flight destinations and avoid hurricanes. If you make enough money, more airports and slots will be at your disposal! Route via multiple airports to avoid hurricanes and traffic congestion!

Controls

  • Select flights with mouse button, and select designated airports
  • Pan map with mouse, WASD or arrow keys

Tools used

  • Engine: Godot - https://godotengine.org/
  • Language: GDScript
  • Gfx: aseprite - https://www.aseprite.org/
  • Music: Garage Band - https://www.apple.com/lae/mac/garageband/
